pkgmetadata.longdescription: DiSTATIS Three Way Metric Multidimensional Scaling // Implement DiSTATIS and CovSTATIS (three-way multidimensional scaling). DiSTATIS and CovSTATIS are used to analyze multiple distance/covariance matrices collected on the same set of observations. These methods are based on Abdi, H., Williams, L.J., Valentin, D., Bennani-Dosse, M. (2012) doi:10.1002/wics.198.
